languages.text: {n}Джай задумчиво накручивает прядь волос на металлический палец.{/n} "Любопытно, шерин. Я полагала, нам придется иметь дело с сервиторами, но нет — кое-где в ваших владениях этот труд по прежнему выполняют люди из крови и плоти!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай задумчиво накручивает прядь волос на металлический палец.{/n} "Любопытно, шерин. Я полагала, нам придется иметь дело с сервиторами, но нет — кое-где в ваших владениях этот труд по прежнему выполняют люди из крови и плоти!"

languages.text: {n}Jae's expression is pensive as she twists a lock of hair around her metal finger.{/n} "Interesting, shereen. I assumed we would be dealing with servitors, but no — some places in your domain still have this work being performed by people of flesh and blood!"
languages.original_text: {n}Джай задумчиво накручивает прядь волос на металлический палец.{/n} "Любопытно, шерин. Я полагала, нам придется иметь дело с сервиторами, но нет — кое-где в ваших владениях этот труд по прежнему выполняют люди из крови и плоти!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's expression is pensive as she twists a lock of hair around her metal finger.{/n} "Interesting, shereen. I assumed we would be dealing with servitors, but no — some places in your domain still have this work being performed by people of flesh and blood!"

{n}Jae's expression is pensive as she twists a lock of hair around her metal finger.{/n} "Interesting, shereen. I assumed we would be dealing with servitors, but no — some places in your domain still have this work being performed by people of flesh and blood!"

{n}Jae's expression is pensive as she twists a lock of hair around her metal finger.{/n} "Interesting, shereen. I assumed we would be dealing with servitors, but no — some places in your domain still have this work being performed by people of flesh and blood!"

{n}Jae's expression is pensive as she twists a lock of hair around her metal finger.{/n} "Interesting, shereen. I assumed we would be dealing with servitors, but no — some places in your domain still have this work being performed by people of flesh and blood!"

languages.text: {n}婕伊露出了深思的表情，把一绺头发缠绕在她的金属手指上。{/n}“真有趣，亲爱的。我本以为我们会与机仆打交道，但并非如此。在你的领地里，某些地方依然是有血有肉的人在从事这项工作！”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's expression is pensive as she twists a lock of hair around her metal finger.{/n} "Interesting, shereen. I assumed we would be dealing with servitors, but no — some places in your domain still have this work being performed by people of flesh and blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊露出了深思的表情，把一绺头发缠绕在她的金属手指上。{/n}“真有趣，亲爱的。我本以为我们会与奴工打交道，但并非如此。在你的领地里，某些地方依然是有血有肉的人在从事这项工作！”

languages.text: {n}Con expresión pensativa, Jae usa su dedo metálico para juguetear con un mechón de pelo.{/n} «Interesante, shereen. Daba por hecho que trataríamos con servidores, pero no: ¡aún hay lugares en sus dominios en los que utilizan a personas de carne y hueso para este trabajo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's expression is pensive as she twists a lock of hair around her metal finger.{/n} "Interesting, shereen. I assumed we would be dealing with servitors, but no — some places in your domain still have this work being performed by people of flesh and blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Con expresión pensativa, Jae usa su dedo metálico para juguetear con un mechón de pelo.{/n} «Interesante, shereen. Daba por hecho que trataríamos con servidores, pero no: ¡aún hay lugares en sus dominios en los que utilizan a personas de carne y hueso para este trabajo!».

languages.text: {n}ジェイは金属性の指で髪を一房くるくるともてあそびながら、物思いにふけっている。{/n}「おもしろいじゃないか、シャリーン。あたしらがサーヴィターの相手をするかと思っていたけど、せずに済んだね。アンタの領地で、こんな仕事を肉と血のある人間がまだやってる場所もあるとはね！」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's expression is pensive as she twists a lock of hair around her metal finger.{/n} "Interesting, shereen. I assumed we would be dealing with servitors, but no — some places in your domain still have this work being performed by people of flesh and blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは金属性の指で髪を一房くるくるともてあそびながら、物思いにふけっている。{/n}「おもしろいじゃないか、シャリーン。あたしらがサーヴィターの相手をするかと思っていたけど、せずに済んだね。アンタの領地で、こんな仕事を肉と血のある人間がまだやってる場所もあるとはね！」

languages.text: {n}Jae dreht nachdenklich eine Haarlocke um ihren Metallfinger.{/n} "Interessant, Shereen. Ich nahm an, wir hätten es mit Servitoren zu tun, aber nein – an einigen Orten in Eurem Reich wird diese Arbeit immer noch von Menschen aus Fleisch und Blut erledigt!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's expression is pensive as she twists a lock of hair around her metal finger.{/n} "Interesting, shereen. I assumed we would be dealing with servitors, but no — some places in your domain still have this work being performed by people of flesh and blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae dreht nachdenklich eine Haarlocke um ihren Metallfinger.{/n} "Interessant, Shereen. Ich nahm an, wir hätten es mit Servitoren zu tun, aber nein – an einigen Orten in Eurem Reich wird diese Arbeit immer noch von Menschen aus Fleisch und Blut erledigt!"

languages.text: {n}L'air pensif, Jae enroule une mèche de cheveux autour de son doigt de métal.{/n} « Intéressant, shereen. Je pensais que nous aurions affaire à des servitors, mais il faut croire que ce travail est toujours effectué par des êtres de chair et de sang dans certaines régions de votre domaine ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's expression is pensive as she twists a lock of hair around her metal finger.{/n} "Interesting, shereen. I assumed we would be dealing with servitors, but no — some places in your domain still have this work being performed by people of flesh and blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air pensif, Jae enroule une mèche de cheveux autour de son doigt de métal.{/n} « Intéressant, shereen. Je pensais que nous aurions affaire à des servitors, mais il faut croire que ce travail est toujours effectué par des êtres de chair et de sang dans certaines régions de votre domaine ! »

languages.text: {n}Jae, metal parmağıyla bir tutam saçını bukle yaparken dalgın dalgın bakıyor.{/n} "Şaşırdım şirinim. Hizmetörlerle muhatap olacağımızı sanıyordum ki yanılmışım. Mülkündeki bazı yerlerde işleri hâlâ kanlı canlı insanlar görüyormuş ya!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's expression is pensive as she twists a lock of hair around her metal finger.{/n} "Interesting, shereen. I assumed we would be dealing with servitors, but no — some places in your domain still have this work being performed by people of flesh and blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, metal parmağıyla bir tutam saçını bukle yaparken dalgın dalgın bakıyor.{/n} "Şaşırdım şirinim. Servitörlerle muhatap olacağımızı sanıyordum ki yanılmışım. Mülkündeki bazı yerlerde işleri hâlâ kanlı canlı insanlar görüyormuş ya!"
